summary: Like this isn't negativity guys, people of color are telling you skamfr is racist as fuck. That isn't negativity, that is a plea...
body:
Like this isn’t negativity guys, people of color are telling you skamfr is racist as fuck. That isn’t negativity, that is a plea for you to check yourselves and the racist ass writers who thought anything of the season was ok to lead up to.

What’s. Not. Clicking ???? It’s not you if you aren’t racist, why are you taking it all so personally. Just because season 3 happened doesn’t mean they aren’t racist. People grow up with racism, we absorb it. We live in a racist society, we must all unlearn it, even poc, the time to actually learn from the people affected by it truly is here and you’re rejecting it. Grow up.

People grow up with racism, we absorb it. We live in a racist society, we must all unlearn it, even poc, the time to actually learn from the people affected by it truly is here and you’re rejecting it. Grow up.

People grow up with racism, we absorb it. We live in a racist society, we must all unlearn it, even poc, the time to actually learn from the people affected by it truly is here and you’re rejecting it. Grow up.

summary: i remember watching season 2 of skfr and not liking charles from the start apart from him and manon not having any chemistry...
question: i remember watching season 2 of skfr and not liking charles from the start apart from him and manon not having any chemistry together , he was arrogant as fuck and invaded her privacy when he looked through her mac. i couldn’t understand why someone as beautiful and intelligent as manon would give him the time of day.
answer:
Hi babe,

I also didn’t really like Charles 🤷🏼‍♀️ I don’t know why but he’s definitely my least favorite William and I remember being annoyed by him since his first slow motion walk 😂 I do love Michel though. He seems like a sweetheart…. but Charles….not so much 😄

summary: I'm muslim too, and I just want to tell you that you were really ble to put into words my feeling about the non-muslim plot...
question: I'm muslim too, and I just want to tell you that you were really ble to put into words my feeling about the non-muslim plot line. Thank you!! That's exactly what bothers me about the whole thing.
answer:
Hey Anon,

I’m glad! 

Yeah I think people in this fandom have really been out there shrugging their shoulders as if they don’t see the big deal in it. And it’s frustrating because even as an adult woman, Sana and Imane’s problems are so relatable that it really resonates. 

I’m done justifying my anger over it but I’m glad you feel it too!

reblog.comment:
Hey Anon,

I’m glad! 

Yeah I think people in this fandom have really been out there shrugging their shoulders as if they don’t see the big deal in it. And it’s frustrating because even as an adult woman, Sana and Imane’s problems are so relatable that it really resonates. 

I’m done justifying my anger over it but I’m glad you feel it too!

I’m done justifying my anger over it but I’m glad you feel it too!

Hey Anon,

summary: Someone please write this fanfiction. I’ll owe you my entire life. I really want to read it.
body:
Someone please write this fanfiction. I’ll owe you my entire life. I really want to read it.

Can the amazing fanfiction writers out there who are much much better than me since I can only seem to write smut. And I’ve only written 2 mediocre fics in my entire life, please please please write me a fanfiction with Lucas receiving a really annoying text from his dad at night causing him to have a panic attack bringing back all his fears and abandonment issues and have Lucas FaceTime eliott who is at his own apartment waking up all groggy but realizing right away what’s happening and eliott calms Lucas down doing his breathing techniques with him until he gets to Lucas’s place and they cuddle and fall asleep.

Oh and please add a line where Lucas’s dad says something like do you think your boyfriend will stay with you, once he finds out how messed up you really are he’ll leave you too. And Lucas tells Eliott about this who gives him a whole big romantic speech why that won’t ever happen.

summary: What gets me the most is when lucas season was airing everyone was like representation so important (and it totally is) but now...
question: What gets me the most is when lucas season was airing everyone was like representation so important (and it totally is) but now a lot of people are like, calm down it's just a show, don't be so negative... like??? As long as you are represented it's enough?
answer:
Anon!!!!!!!! Just start preaching louder aleeady!!!!

Jokes aside, the double standard is amazing. But while I’m disappointed, I’m not surprised. People were bound to show their true colours eventually. I would say it’s a lack of understanding of what representation is, as some seems to think that having a black woman as main on screen is enough even if she is a supporting character in what is supposed to be her season. However, I would bet real money that if it had been s3 who had taken this turn, people would have rioted 24/7. But You know.
